MolEvolvR 0.99.9

Getting started

Source: .github/outreachy_guidelines.md

Welcome aboard, Outreachy intern! 🙌

JRaviLab Onboarding

  1. Visit the MolEvolvR package repository; please start with the README doc in the repository.
  2. Read our companion MolEvolvR web-app preprint here.
  3. Follow instructions from the repo README to install MolEvolvR, starting with bioconductor installation instructions.
  4. Make sure you can build the package with R CMD build or run tests with devtools.
  5. Check out open issues, select a task labeled Outreachy, and ask to be assigned to it.
  6. Create a branch for the specific task and submit a PR (“pull request”), and respond to any feedback from reviewers.
